non_compliant.section: 我們收集的資訊可能包括下列項目： 姓名和聯絡資料。我們會收集您的名字、姓氏、顯示名稱、電子郵件地址、郵寄地址、電話號碼和/或其他類似的聯絡資訊。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimisation - data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary in relation to the purposes for which they are processed
non_compliant.amend: Specify the exact purposes for collecting each category of data (name, surname, display name, email address, mailing address, phone number) and ensure that the collection of this data is necessary for those specific purposes. If the purpose is for marketing, explicit consent must be obtained.

non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing - Consent of the data subject
